angryAnswer: m Artificial debt created by artificial borders. In the grand scheme of things, heaven and hell are one and the same.
m This is the box I saw Jadis carry, you finally found it!
m Our heavenly brethren. We should not shun them and instead bridge the gap of artificial morality.
m My preferred literature would be Sun Tzu's 'The Art of No War'.

dialogue: P Are you the one responsible for tax fraud?
N My brother in Satan, I have always been at your disposal for any help or questions.
P Which is exactly what someone trying to misled me would do.
N I would never do that to you, but I understand, you are doing your job.
